original_text: You yourselves are our letter of recommendation, written on our hearts, to be known and read by all.
korean_text: 너희는 우리의 편지라 우리 마음에 썼고 뭇 사람이 알고 읽는 바라

sentences.original_text: You yourselves are our letter of recommendation
to be known and read by all
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 알고 읽게 하려는 것입니다
